title: Yopparai wo Hirotta Kanojo to Ibukuro wo Tsukamareta Otoko - Novel Updates
tags: Cooking   Female Protagonist   Knights   Misunderstandings   Oneshot
author: 綾崎オトイ
description:
「Why have you collapsed in front of another person’s house?」

A story about a woman who picked up a drunk man in front of her house and a man who got captivated by her cooking.>
